schemas.name: schema.graphql
schemas.content:
# 来自canaan商城的数据集合
type Canaan {
  # Everyone, everywhere
  allPeople: [Person]
  person(id: ID!): Person
}

# An object with an ID
interface Node {
  # The id of the object.
  id: ID!
}

# Somebody that you used to know
type Person implements Node {
  # The ID of an object
  id: ID!

  # What you yell at me
  firstName: String

  # What you yell at me when I've been bad
  lastName: String

  # A name sandwich
  fullName: String

  # Where to send junk mail
  email: String

  # Log in as this
  username: String

  # People who lent you money
  friends: [Person]
}

# 所有数据的根查询
type Query {
  canaan: Canaan

  # Fetches an object given its ID
  node(
    # The ID of an object
    id: ID!
  ): Node
}
